QuestData.Title: Sparkle in the Eye
QuestData.Description: I've been staring down into the waters of the lake, pondering life, love, and everything beautiful, and suddenly I realized that the sparkles in the water aren't just a reflection of my radiant personality, there are actually some sort of shining objects down there! Surely valuable.$B$BWould you mind taking a drip and relieving the lake's depths of its mysterious sparkles? Pretty please?
